events.name: Hack To The Future 11.02.2012 (Kids)
events.about:
Our first Hackademy Inside the Machine event on Oct 26th 2011 provided30 youngsters with opportunities to engage in physical computing projects incl. Arduino, sensor boards, building a computer, micro controllers and Hama beads. Then our family event Hackademy After Hours on Nov 4th engaged 50 children, parents and grandparents in teams to create awesome role playing games. 

Our next full day event is to be our biggest yet, with over 200 children from around the North West, eg. Manchester, Liverpool, Preston, Blackpool, Wigan, Bolton etc.  all taking part in this exciting opportunity - think BarCamp for kids. You can watch a video here I recorded that explains a little more. 

The event is aimed at youngsters aged between 11 and 18 years old. 

The aim is to enable todays digital creators to engage with YOU the digital creators of tomorrow.

Digital Creators - Speakers We have 50 digital creatives, games designers, visual effects designers, programmers, developers, hardware and software engineers, TV presenters, games studios, producers and students to present workshops, masterclasses, demonstrations and talks to engage and inspire YOU. 

We will also have many geek girls coming along to show you that girls can compute too, these include Samantha Bail, Collette Curry and Stray Fallow.

There will be a huge range of activities. 

This event will take place at Our Ladys High School PR2 3SQ, Preston. This will be followed by events in other regions, eg. Birmingham, London, South Wales.
